meta.description: Versioned readiness thresholds with calibration policy

rationale: Initial thresholds based on teaching principle (R0/R1 lenient, R2/R3 strict)

tuning_metrics.rework_rate: TBD - track artifacts needing rework after generation

calibration_policy.description: Thresholds are defaults stored in versioned file, changed via explicit PR with documented rationale
when_to_tune: False 'ready': Users generate artifacts that turn out incomplete (measured by expert review rejections)
False 'not ready': Users override dependencies frequently and succeed (measured by override rate vs rework rate)
User feedback: Explicit reports of 'too lenient' or 'too strict'
how_to_tune: Collect metrics (override rate, rework rate, review rejection rate)
Propose threshold change in PR with rationale + data
Update readiness_thresholds.json with new version number
